Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Still, I'm glad that's all you came for.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>If you told me you were here to pick up
some <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>, I'd have been in a tight
spot, make no mistake.
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>A fair question. I don't have the whole
picture, but to start with...
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take <clr:0000>Medda<clr:ffff>, for instance, who was the
first to cultivate Hylian tomatoes here.<sp:0:4:0>I suspect he's more open-minded about
these things than one would think.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>I believe that during the day, he works on
<clr:0000>the field behind this shop<clr:ffff>.
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_00>Or will you? <sp:5:0:0>My goodness, but you're
swimming in <clr:0000>Hylian shrooms<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Why don't I compensate you for eight
of them and ask that you distribute those
Hylian shrooms to prospective voters?
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There's <clr:0000>old man Tokk<clr:ffff>, who's retired.<sp:0:4:0>You'll find him taking a walk up the hill to
the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff> each and every morning.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>If he's not there, hmm...check outside
the pasture.
Talk_71: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I've told you what I know.<sp:0:4:0>Was any of it unclear?
Talk_72:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rumor has it that <clr:0000>the married couple at
the inn<clr:ffff> are quarreling over fashion.<sp:0:4:0>Look into it, hmm? Fashion should bring
people together, not drive them apart!
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0000>Dantz<clr:ffff>, the pasture's owner, might be a
hard sell, but there's no harm in trying.<sp:0:4:0>He also has a darling little girl named
<clr:0000>Koyin<clr:ffff>, who I bet will jump at the chance.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Ease>What modern young woman would turn
up her nose at the delights of fashion?
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you met Uma? <sp:5:1:0>She does farmwork in
<clr:0000>the school's field during the day<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>You'll find that the older generation is
early to bed and early to rise, so your
window of opportunity will be limited.<sp:0:4:0>Make the most of the chance you get!
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Do you know <clr:0000>Tamana<clr:ffff>, the Cucco farmer?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>With her husband away, she serves as
gatekeeper at night, <sp:5:0:0>while still taking care
of her Cuccos at the house by day.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Where would someone so busy become
acquainted with fashion if we did not take
it upon ourselves to introduce her?
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Old Leop at the inn is a vegetable lover
at heart, you know.<sp:0:4:0>It's to the point where he carries veggies
around with him when he goes walking.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>He and Mayor Reede have been close for
a long time, you see.
Talk_80:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>There's something to be admired in how
unashamedly you admit you forgot.<sp:5:0:0>
Very well, then.
Talk_75: <sp:3:0:2:0701>What, you got other business with me?
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>OK, I'm headed home in that case.
See ya later.
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't have the whole picture, but to
start with...
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I can see you mean well enough with
the gift, so I'm happy to accept. Thanks.
Talk_82:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>No, I won't be giving you any more Hylian
shrooms, no matter how often you ask.
Take some responsibility!<sp:0:4:0>You lost them, and now it's <clr:0000>up to you<clr:ffff> to
find more. Try, I don't know, scavenging
around trees or buying them in shops.
Talk_83:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I had every intention of giving you a
big hearty truffle as a token of thanks.<sp:0:4:0>And I may yet, provided you return to me
with room for one in your pouch.
Talk_78:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No particular business to take care of,
eh? That's fine, then.
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>I see you've cast aside a few of your
trinkets and baubles. Good!<sp:0:4:0>That means I can thank you properly,<sp:5:0:0>
with a reward worthy of your service.
Talk_79:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>My, look how the time goes by when you
get lost in conversation. I'd better see to
my field, haven't I?
Talk_85:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Uhhh...did you have a gift in mind?<sp:0:4:0>Maybe you forgot to bring it with you?
That happens sometimes.
Talk_86:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>Well then... <sp:5:0:0>I have work to do, so I'll
be on my way.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oho! We've delivered all my little gifts,
I see. Well done!<sp:0:4:0>That ought to help a few of those Reede
voters see the light.<sp:0:4:0>Here you are. A sign of my gratitude.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, so eager to get started on my little
errand already? You'll need these, then.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>It's a rare mushroom worth more than
most can afford.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>As you're on team Cece, I expect you to
eat it and fire yourself up for the <clr:0000>mayoral
election <clr:ffff>coming up.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>These mushrooms are for the village's
Reede supporters. <sp:5:1:0>It's easy to recognize
them by how <clr:0000>unstylish<clr:ffff> they are.<sp:0:4:0>My supporters are all expert fashionistas
dressed to the nines in <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal>This should go without saying, but DON'T
give one to anyone in Reede's family!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>There's also no need to give them to
children, travelers, or any temporary
residents like the Sheikah researchers.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That leaves us with, unless I miss my
guess, a total of <clr:0000>eight<clr:ffff> Reede supporters.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Your mission is simpleâ€”give a single
Hylian shroom to <clr:0000>each of those eight<clr:ffff>
misguided voters.<sp:0:4:0>Well, off you go!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Mm-hmm. That means we still have...<clr:0000><sp:2:2:48:420048006100740065006e006f005f00560069006c006c006100670065004d00610079006f00720045006c0065006300740069006f006e005f0063006f0075006e007400ffff00cd>
<sp:c9:6:28:1000760069006c006c0061006700650072001200760069006c006c00610067006500720073000000><clr:ffff> waiting for their complimentary
mushrooms.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>We mustn't rest until there's a mushroom
in every Reede voter's hands.<sp:0:4:0>Are there any further questions?
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What is a Reede supporter darkening my
door for? I'm too busy with the mayoral
election to spare you any of my time.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Unless you've come to tell me you've had
a change of heart? I'll ask again. You're...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But naturally, no grand gesture can be
simple, hmm? If only you weren't so
weighed down by needless possessions.<sp:0:4:0>In such a world, you might have received
a big hearty truffle as a token of thanks.<sp:0:4:0>We shall never know unless you return to
me with room to spare, will we?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Hm? Is there something you need from
me, Mr. Traveler?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I believe I remember Sophie saying not
long ago that the preparations for the
mayoral election were complete.<sp:0:4:0>So your timing is excellent. Speak to
<clr:0000>Sophie <clr:ffff>about next steps.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Oh...you again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>I've got a long to-do list in preparation
for the <clr:0000>mayoral election<clr:ffff>, and the sooner
I get started, the better.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:5:1:0>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The answer should go without saying,<sp:5:1:0>
but you are of course...
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>What's this? <sp:5:0:0>Something from Cece?<sp:5:1:0> Yeah,
pretty obvious from the look of it.<sp:0:4:0>Y'know, people keep talking up this
Cece-brand stuff, but it never really
clicked with me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>I know the lady works hard, but most
of us <clr:0000>farmers<clr:ffff> around here aren't too
precious about our clothes.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>But sure, <sp:5:0:0>thanks for the mushroom.
That's mighty nice of you.
Talk_14: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh? Have you handed them out already?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There's the magic words I was waiting for!
You're a lifesaver.<sp:0:4:0>Now then, you'll be needing these.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>Huh! You say this is from Cece?<sp:5:0:0>
Thank ya kindly.<sp:0:4:0>Us <clr:0000>old folks<clr:ffff> don't know much about
what's "in" now, you know.<sp:0:4:0>I'm happy to vote for whoever for mayor
if they'll fix up the village real nice.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>What's this? Did we forget our mission to
hand out mushrooms to Reede voters and
paint them in Cece colors inside and out?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>That settles that, I trust.<sp:0:4:0>It's plain for all to see that I'm a shoo-in
for the next mayor!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Or so one would think. Yet there are
stragglers in this village still <clr:0000>supporting
Reede<clr:ffff>. They need a mental makeover!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>AND <sp:5:0:0>SO<sp:5:0:0>!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I have a fabulous plan to give out
mushrooms to <clr:0000>Reede's supporters<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Mushrooms are synonymous with the
Cece brand! Fungal fashion is the
Cece way!<sp:0:4:0>The mushrooms I give them will paint
them inside and out with fresh, vibrant,
Cece-brand colors!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Although...Sophie and I must mind the
shop. <sp:5:1:0>WHERE will we find someone we
can trust to carry out this vital task?
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>You seem like you want to give me
something, but I don't see a gift in your
hands or nothing.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oho. If you haven't yet thrown in your lot
with either candidate, then...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Welcome to Team Cece.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Did ya have something for me or no?
You got that look on your face like you
were s'posed to, but...
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Pffft! There's no room in this shop for
a Reede supporter!<sp:0:4:0>Sophie! Call security! I abjure you,
Reedeist!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Look, I'm not denying mushrooms are
nice to look at. But to go from that to
wearing them is...well...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>And I'm not the only one who thinks so.
The <clr:0000>couple at the inn <clr:ffff>didn't see eye to
eye about the same thing.<sp:0:4:0>I guess it's tough sometimes to be
married to someone with <clr:0000>different
tastes <clr:ffff>than you.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The mushrooms are for the village's
Reede supporters. It's easy to recognize
them by how <clr:0000>unstylish<clr:ffff> they are.<sp:0:4:0>My supporters are all expert fashionistas
dressed to the nines in <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>And I don't have an unlimited number of
mushrooms to hand out.<sp:0:4:0>So it should go without saying, but DON'T
give one to anyone in Reede's family!<sp:0:4:0>There's also no need to give them to
children, travelers, or any temporary
residents like the Sheikah researchers.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseS>Come now! <sp:5:0:0>Didn't I provide enough Hylian
shrooms so that each of the other side's
voters could get one?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's <clr:0000>up to you<clr:ffff> to recoup any losses. <sp:5:0:0>If you
need a hint, try scavenging around trees
or buying them in shops.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>What's with the delivery-boy act?
Especially when you don't look like
you have anything to deliver...
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There are <clr:0000>eight<clr:ffff> Reede supporters we
might be able to reach out to. You'll know
them by their unfortunate fashion choices.<sp:0:4:0>We must waste no time in opening their
eyes for them!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you got all that?<sp:0:4:0>The tackiest people are the ones who act
as though they understand when they
haven't a clue.
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Do you have something for this old man?<sp:5:0:0>
Are you sure? I don't see anything on
you that I'd want...
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_00>Is this from Cece? Isn't that sweet!<sp:5:1:0> These
are tasty if you fry 'em up as a snack.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't get me wrong, I appreciate the gift.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think>But me and my daughter, <clr:0000>Koyin<clr:ffff>, and old
man <clr:0000>Tokk <clr:ffff>don't care much about clothes.
What use is fashion in the field, right?
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>What's this? That's a fine-looking
mushroom you brought me.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>If you mean to give me something, I don't
see anything I can take.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>A gift from Cece? Thanks for that.<sp:0:4:0>The world of fashion moves too fast for
us <clr:0000>old folks<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But I'm in favor of any mayor who can
make sure this village stays a place where
the younger folk are happy to live.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Eh? What do you want with an old man
like me?
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Not sure I understand what you're
meanin' to give me. Could you maybe
have dropped it somewhere?
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Um...<sp:0:4:0>I get the sense you brought me a gift, but
I'm not sure what it was supposed to be.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>You say this is from Cece? Well...that's
generous of her. Thanks.
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Seems like lately, Cece's mushrooms are
popping up everywhere around here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Makes my eyes water a bit to see those
flashy colors wherever I turn.<sp:0:4:0>My <clr:0000>family<clr:ffff> and all my <clr:0000>friends my age<clr:ffff> tend
to take life slower than she does.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Still and all, it'd be rude to turn down
a generous gift. <sp:5:0:0>Thank you.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>You need something else? Something not
related to the inn?
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's our farm's specialty. Or it was.<sp:0:4:0>We use acorns in our cows' feed, and I
haven't been able to get my hands on
any lately.<sp:0:4:0>If you do need some milk, you might
check the general store. It's possible
they have some left.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>All I'd need is <clr:0000>three<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>acorns<clr:ffff> to mix
up some more feed for the cows, and I
can't even get that.
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh! For me? Thanks!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>My wife loves Cece stuff, so I'll save it as
a treat for her.<sp:0:4:0>I'm not too into the designs myself, but
she is pretty pleased with them.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>And she does look incredibly cute when
she wears them too! Yeah, that Cece is
all right in my book.<sp:0:4:0>And I'm not the only one. Koyin from the
<clr:0000>farm <clr:ffff>on the hill said the same thing.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Might've just been my imagination.
I have been a mite preoccupied taking
care of my cows.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No? Then feel free to stay at the inn,
if you like.
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>If you mean to give me something, I don't
see anything I can take. Maybe you
dropped it somewhere?<sp:0:4:0>Anyways, I'd better go back to tending
the cows.
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I get the sense that the <clr:0000>older villagers<clr:ffff>
take little interest in their clothing.
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah, it's my farm's specialty. Didn't I
mention it?
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You brought this from Cece? Wow, uh...
Thank you!<sp:0:4:0>There's a lot of ways you can prepare
mushrooms. They're tasty on their own
too. I just like 'em, OK?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>But...that's when they're food. When you
make them fashion, you lose me.<sp:0:4:0>It wasn't so long ago that doing stuff like
that was completely unheard-of here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_00>The <clr:0000>farm families<clr:ffff> don't know what to
make of it either. Can you blame them?
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Something tells me that many <clr:0000>farmers <clr:ffff>in
this village are sadly unacquainted with
the latest trends.
Talk_56: <sp:3:0:2:0700>You tell Cece I said thanks, all right?
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've heard it said that <clr:0000>those who work at
the pasture<clr:ffff> here care little for fashion.
Go and see about changing their minds.
